417130.name: Era
417130.description:
Era is a Free to Play PC title, combining the card game genre with team-based turn based RPG elements; a hybrid between Hearthstone and Final Fantasy. The player gathers Characters, finds Skill Cards, crafts Weapons and creates a team of up to four characters to fight battles against other players, or AI in daily tasks and quests.

When the player first starts the game, they create an account and choose their preferred Faction. The player can then create a team of up to four characters. Characters can be summoned by spending summoning gems, and once characters are summoned, they are permanently in your inventory. Each character gets summoned with specific Attributes, Weapon Styles and Character Elements.

Once the player has chosen their ideal team, they can choose to fight other players in PVP mode, or play against the AI for rewards. The PVP fights can be found in the World Map. Each faction owns an area of the map, and the player can freely choose which faction they wish to attack. The borders of each faction’s area will change depending the wins/losses of each faction, and every new Era they will get finalized.
